code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes,Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import Login from"./Login";import Signup from"./Signup";import Dashboard from"./Dashboard";import logo from"./assets/logo.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[userEmail,setUserEmail]=useState("");const handleLogin=email=>{setIsLoggedIn(true);setUserEmail(email);};const handleLogout=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(false);setUserEmail("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",style:{width:"180px",margin:"20px auto",display:"block"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/signup",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Signup,{onSignup:handleLogin})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard",element:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{userEmail:userEmail,onLogout:handleLogout}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"})})]})]})});}export default App;
